text: Sihamte arau kaya, â€˜e'ibora catuspada jantura petata yi ache seya amara majara purausasakalara babe nirdista arau e'ito amara straisakalara babe abaidha, arau se'ito yadi mrta haya tente sakalorae iyara ansidaraâ€™. Te'om sihamtara e'idarae koraara pratiphala anatipalame sihamtaka pradana karaiba; niscaya te'om prajnamaya, sarbajna
